short_summary: Purchase of HP-Serveur and related NVspecs
description: This solicitation is for the purchase of a High Performance Computing Server and related technical specifications.  Bidders can register in the SSC P2P portal in order to:a. view and access solicitations from SSC;b. submit a response to a solicitation;c. receive updates and amendments regarding solicitations;d. be awarded contracts and receive contract amendments; ande. submit invoices and receive payment status updates.  To register, please go to https://supplier-fournisseur-sspc2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login and click Register Now. SSC Eaton 9PX for Global Affairs Canada-Amendment 002
